nodes.text: The Wall of Remembrance was a landmark located on the planet Almas.

It was essentially a massive wall, similar to the Memory wall on Coruscant, that held the names of all the Jedi that were killed in battle. As part of a ceremony, after the name was engraved on the wall, any surviving students or friends of the slain Jedi were allowed to make a speech on the life of their comrade.
During the Clone Wars, the number of names on the wall grew rapidly, which was a fact that alarmed the Jedi that studied at Almas Academy.
A similar wall was located on Cularin.
